meaningMnemonic: The <radical>fins</radical> that fell onto my <radical>sword</radical> were sliced into many <kanji>part</kanji>s. Following this logic, this also means <kanji>minute</kanji>, which is part of an hour, and <kanji>divide</kanji>, which is the action of splitting something into many parts.
readingMnemonic: Now that the fins have been cut into neat <kanji>part</kanji>s, it's time to cut something else: <reading>bun</reading>s (ぶん).
